summary: All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) have been implemented in the diff. REQ-1 updated Navigation.tsx to use forest palette colors for both desktop and mobile views. REQ-2 reordered routes in App.tsx placing /about immediately after / and updated navigation links accordingly. REQ-3 extended PollutionMap.tsx to include 180+ countries with pollution data, SVG paths, interactivity, and tooltips. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
